title: 'error constructed but not emitted' when parsing const keyword

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: A-parser
labels.description: Area: The parsing of Rust source code to an AST.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust trait t { const impl ``` md5 of poc.rs: 7593012a00629a632a7b06982cbccb2f The bug can be reproduced via `rustc poc.rs` ### Meta The bug is reproduced with nightly and beta versions, __but not with__ stable version. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.51.0-nightly (4f4656d46 2021-02-04) binary: rustc commit-hash: 4f4656d46d84a488ae3df34b08f362d7071036a0 commit-date: 2021-02-04 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.51.0-nightly LLVM version: 11.0.1 rustc 1.50.0-beta.8 (1cd030396 2021-01-20) binary: rustc commit-hash: 1cd0303963629f317a08e7e52162ccca7232ae7f commit-date: 2021-01-20 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.50.0-beta.8 ``` ### Error output The output is from nightly version. ``` ➜ playground rustc poc.rs error: this file contains an unclosed delimiter --> out.rs:2:6 | 1 | trait t { const | - unclosed delimiter 2 | impl | ^ error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted error: expected identifier, found keyword `impl` --> out.rs:2:1 | 2 | impl | ^^^^ expected identifier, found keyword | help: you can escape reserved keywords to use them as identifiers | 2 | r#impl | thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:460:13 note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` environment variable to display a backtrace error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (4f4656d46 2021-02-04) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to 3 previous errors ```
Backtrace

``` ➜ playground RURUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc poc.rs error: this file contains an unclosed delimiter --> out.rs:2:6 | 1 | trait t { const | - unclosed delimiter 2 | impl | ^ error: internal compiler error: the following error was constructed but not emitted error: expected identifier, found keyword `impl` --> out.rs:2:1 | 2 | impl | ^^^^ expected identifier, found keyword | help: you can escape reserved keywords to use them as identifiers | 2 | r#impl | thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', compiler/rustc_errors/src/diagnostic_builder.rs:460:13 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: ::drop 2: rustc_parse::parser::item::::recover_const_impl 3: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_common_ 4: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_common 5: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_assoc_item 6: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_common_ 7: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_item_common 8: rustc_parse::parser::item::::parse_mod 9: rustc_parse::parse_crate_from_file 10: rustc_session::utils::::time 11: rustc_interface::passes::parse 12: rustc_interface::queries::Queries::parse 13: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 14: rustc_span::with_source_map 15: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 16: rustc_span::with_session_globals note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.51.0-nightly (4f4656d46 2021-02-04) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack error: aborting due to 3 previous errors ```
